DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the central 5-HT1B receptor occupancy of ZOMIG® Rapimelt (zolmitriptan) in healthy male volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Determine Central 5-HT1B Receptor Occupancy of ZOMIG® Rapimelt (Zolmitriptan) in Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Body mass index between ≥19 and ≤30 kg/m2. A history or presence of neurological, haematological, psychiatric, gastrointestinal, hepatic, pulmonary, renal disease Use of drugs that induce the liver drug metabolising enzymes within 4 weeks before first PET
